short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency requires one new Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope in Charlottetown
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Charlottetown Laboratory requires one new Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope with LED Light Source, Stand and Camera.
full_summary:
# Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope Tender

(Note: Tender expires on October 27th, 2023)

## Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: cb-16-10257314
- **Solicitation Number**: 2024-00098
- **Amendment Number**: 4
- **Publication Date**: October 11th, 2023
- **Closes**: October 27th, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET.

## Description of Goods/Services
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Charlottetown Laboratory is seeking a new Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope, complete with an LED Light Source, Stand and Camera.

## Additional Details
- This bid solicitation supersedes previous tender number 2024-00098 dated July 25th, 2023 with a closing of August 9th at 2:00 PM.
- Suppliers who submitted bids on the previous solicitation may request a debriefing or feedback session upon request.

## Important Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 59 Camelot Dr., Ottawa, ON, K2G 5W6, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Saifeldin Abdelhady (Saifeldin.Abdelhady@Inspection.gc.ca, 343-540-5433)

## Document
- Download the Tender Notice [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21800/2024-00098---npp-v2_1.pdf).

## UNSPC Code
-  *41111722: Fluorescent microscopes*
